16.6.2 Data Preparation
There is a lot of ﬂexibility in preparing this data for modeling. The speciﬁc data preparation
methods and their beneﬁt really depend on the chosen framing of the problem and the modeling
methods. Nevertheless, below is a list of general data preparation methods that may be useful:
 Daily diﬀerencing may be useful to adjust for the daily cycle in the data.
